# mHostTime

**Instance Property**

The host machine’s time base (see `CoreAudio/HostTime.h`).

## Declaration

```swift
var mHostTime: UInt64
```

## Accessing the Data

- **mFlags**: A set of flags indicating which representations of the time are valid; see `Audio Time Stamp Flags` and `Audio Time Stamp Flag Combination Constant`.
- **mRateScalar**: The ratio of actual host ticks per sample frame to the nominal host ticks per sample frame.
- **mReserved**: Pads the structure out to force an even 8-byte alignment.
- **mSMPTETime**: The SMPTE time (see [doc://com.apple.coreaudiotypes/documentation/CoreAudioTypes/SMPTETime]).
- **mSampleTime**: The absolute sample frame time.
- **mWordClockTime**: The word clock time.
